Elementary & Special Functions and VIs

Owning Palette: Mathematics VIs

Requires: Base Development System. This topic might not match its corresponding palette in LabVIEW depending on your operating system, licensed product(s), and target.

Use the Elementary & Special Functions and VIs to evaluate common mathematical functions.

The VIs on this palette can return mathematics error codes.

SubpaletteDescription
Bessel Functions VIsUse this class of special functions to compute Bessel-related functions.
Discrete Math VIsUse this class of elementary functions to compute discrete math functions for areas such as combinatorics and number theory.
Elliptic & Parabolic Functions VIsUse this class of special functions to compute specific forms of elliptic integrals or Weber functions.
Elliptic Integrals VIsUse this class of special functions to compute complete and incomplete elliptic integrals.
Error Functions VIsUse this class of special functions to compute Error-related functions.
Exponential FunctionsUse this class of elementary functions to compute exponential and logarithmic functions.
Exponential Integrals VIsUse this class of special functions to compute exponential integrals.
Gamma Functions VIsUse this class of special functions to compute Gamma-related functions.
Gating Functions VIsUse this class of elementary functions to compute common periodic waves at given points.
Hyperbolic FunctionsUse this class of elementary functions to compute hyperbolic functions and their inverses.
Hypergeometric Functions VIsUse this class of special functions to compute functions based on the hypergeometric differential equation.
Trigonometric FunctionsUse this class of elementary functions to compute trigonometric functions and their inverses.
